experience: You and Channing both know Judith McRae, Denise Gudzikowski, and 22 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Strategic technical architect, banking and financial services. Platform modernization, applications and systems architecture, and solutions design.  Cloud applications, vendor integration, data processing and ETL.

Provide technical leadership in the form of mentoring, design, development, oversight, and architecture for projects related to enhancing the fixed income trading platform at Charles Schwab.  Projects typically include a team of developers in the US at various Schwab sites, and developers offshore in India.
Previously the lead software developer and software architect, I accepted a promotion to lead and manage the day-to-day activities of the development group.
Acting as the technical lead and software architect for an applications development group in the corporate headquarters of a major professional builders' supply company.

I was a staff-level lead developer doing analysis and programming for enterprise-wide package implementations and custom development projects.  Technologies include Java, J2EE, IBM WebSphere Portal, and Oracle 10g.

IT Innovation and Transformation Leader & Solutions Strategist
May 31, 2008, Channing worked with Lou in the same group

Channing embodies the most important trait in an employee -- adaptability.  Channing's ability to gladly learn and apply new technology was a great asset to our team, often managing several new concepts at once to develop true Rich Internet Applications. He works under the notion of providing the right solution at the right time, which lends to a sensibility in introducing an acceptable amount of technology risk to a project.  While working at Qualcomm, Channing often took things I introduced and expanded on them, making them even more viable and often showing me new ways to solve old problems.  I much appreciated his support in helping evangelize new technologies to other team members.  I certainly would look forward to working with him again in the future.

Solution Delivery Manager - MDM at Informatica
January 24, 2007, Channing worked with John in the same group

I worked with Channing at CSC on a project for a large commercial bank. He led the design of the application and I designed the data base. Channing was dedicated to making the application work for the client and was an excellent co-worker within the project team. Channing worked well with all of the technical consultants and was a true knowledge leader for the team. He was also well respected by the client staff and was the primary liaison between the business users and the technical team. This project was in the early days of distributed computing client server technology and we were doing things that were new and innovative. The project would not have been a success without Channing’s hard work and dedication to the project and the needs of the client. I highly recommend the technical work he did at CSC, his dedication to the project team and ability to always stay focused on the needs of the client.

Leslie King (M.S. HCI, CUA)
Senior UX Researcher and Designer
March 31, 2010, Leslie worked with Channing in the same group

I had the pleasure of working directly with Leslie on several projects during my time at Qualcomm, Inc.  Her main role while I worked with her was application and project QA.  Leslie always exhibited a high caliber of professionalism and competency in her work at Qualcomm.Leslie formulated and established a systematic approach by which project work was verified through quality assurance practices previously non-existent within our group.  She consistently worked alongside developers and programmers to learn about the applications she was testing, and to discuss cooperative solutions to issues raised by her and application users.  She conducted herself in a way that somehow gained her trust from both the customer side, and the IT side of projects, which is a rare talent.Leslie was also constantly keeping her skills up-to-date and working toward building a skill set that would get her into the kind of work she really desired.  Her ongoing education not only helped our group benefit from her increasing knowledge related to QA methods and practice, but we also gained a usability and UI design go-to person as a result of the classes she was taking.

summary: An accomplished software developer and architect for over 23 years, Channing currently focuses on platform modernization and cloud application architecture.  He is directing his team and organization in retiring legacy applications, and moving to a platform that will enable truly agile software development methodologies, and continuous delivery of business value.  Channing is helping his organization establish processes and technology platforms that will facilitate a move to a DevOps culture, and accelerate delivery of business value.  He has blazed new trails, proven new concepts, and been instrumental in defining guidelines and procedures that lay a path for many other application groups to follow.Some highlights of Channing's innovation and leadership at Charles Schwab include: - Early adoption of Cloud Foundry platform and cloud architecture- Evangelization of test driven development and DevOps - Participation in enterprise architecture governance bodies and innovation forums- Mentoring team members, and guiding career progression- Facilitate technology forums for information sharing and team direction- Development of re-usable code libraries
name: Channing Jackson
title: Technical Director, Applications Architect at Charles Schwab
